channel.title: Post count
channel.description:
I am wondering something. How come my postcount went from 121 to 51 -.- I realize thats not a big number but seriously why?
edit: Actually I looked it up and I am supposed to have 174 posts info please. and thank you.

item.title: Post count
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

Ok thank you guys man I got to earn the title senior member again oh well I’ll post some tuts and get over it.

Read full topic

item.title: Post count
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Probably because of the mass deletion of 3 forums on moparscape, caused by someone gaining control of TheBeanie’s account. When posts are sent to the Rubbish Bin, they no longer contribute to your post count, and thus it appears that your post count went down.

Read full topic

item.title: Post count
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Who knows, posts/thread got deleted or something, I don’t really notice it much but every so often a few of my posts go away anyhow post count doesn’t really matter unless the posts have something useful in them.

Read full topic
